nodes.text: Dotti was a pet voorpak belonging to the female entertainer Mairlenn. Sometime following the Battle of Yavin in 0 BBY, Dotti was eaten by a pack of beasts in the Nabooian countrside. Angered, Mairlenn demanded that Radanthus Mandelatara find a way to 'punish' the beasts.
Dotti was mentioned in the 2003 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided.
